topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack® Carrier Grade (Alpha): Deleting Provider Networks

titlealts.searchtitle: HP Helion OpenStack® Carrier Grade (Alpha): Creating Externally Available Networks

body.p: An admin user can create and delete provider networks in any project, as needed.
Instances must be disassociated from any network you want to delete.

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Helion Dashboard.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Networks link.
The network(s) for the selected project appear.
For the network you want to delete, click the arrow icon in the Actions menu and select Delete Network.
To delete multiple networks, click the check box next to name of each network to delete. Click Delete Networks.
